## Introduction

The [mapwidget](https://mapwidget.gishub.org/) package by [Qiusheng Wu](https://github.com/giswqs) provides a set of custom map widgets for creating interactive maps in a Jupyter environment using different JavaScript mapping libraries, such as `Cesium`, `Mapbox`, `MapLibre`, `Leaflet`, and `OpenLayers`.

Here we show that [`mapwidget.cesium`](https://mapwidget.gishub.org/examples/cesium/) also works with Panel.
